Package it.unipr.ingegneria.entities.user

Class Customer

java.lang.Object
it.unipr.ingegneria.entities.user.User
it.unipr.ingegneria.entities.user.Customer
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAuthentication, IObserver
public class Customer
extends User
implements IAuthentication, IObserver
The Customer class defines the behavior of the User type Customer. Extends the class User and implements IAuthentication and IObserver interface
Author:
Ruslan Vasyunin, Francesca Rossi, Everton Ejike
See Also:
IAuthentication, IObserver, User
